title: How does AUTOMATIC call screen differ from manual call screen if I'm not there to make the decision?
content:
I'm deciding whether  to purchase this phone or not.  Is AUTOMATIC call screen still restricted to the United States and if so, why?

So the assistant takes the call without me pressing the screen button but I'm not around, say I'm taking a shower ... what does it do then that would be different from the call going to carrier voicemail?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 4a
